text: How we can move marketing email data from one portal to another with all advance fields ?

*There is an app called the HubSpot to HubSpot Portal Migrator.*
his data migration tool automates to process of migrating data from one HubSpot portal to another
yes but it does not move marketing email data along with advanced fields like sent , delivered , open rate and so on
Than you try with Third party api like zapier
